SELECT *
FROM COOLER_MANUFACTURER CM JOIN COOLER_COOLING_METHOD CCM ON CM.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CCM.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN COOLER_INTEL_SOCKET CIS ON CCM.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CIS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN COOLER_AMD_SOCKET CAS ON CIS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CAS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN COOLER_HEIGHT CH ON CAS.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CH.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX

SELECT C.COOLER_IDX, (SELECT COOLER_MANUFACTURER_NAME FROM COOLER_MANUFACTURER WHERE COOLER_MANUFACTURER_IDX = C.COOLER_MANUFACTURER_IDX) AS COOLER_MANUFACTURER_NAME, C.COOLER_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_CAPACITY FROM COOLER_CAPACITY WHERE COOLER_CAPACITY_IDX = C.COOLER_CAPACITY_IDX) AS COOLER_CAPACITY_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_TYPE FROM COOLER_TYPE WHERE COOLER_TYPE_IDX = C.COOLER_TYPE_IDX) AS COOLER_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_COMPATIBILITY FROM COOLER_COMPATIBILITY WHERE COOLER_COMPATIBILITY_IDX = C.COOLER_COMPATIBILITY_IDX) AS COOLER_COMPATIBILITY_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_COOLING_METHOD FROM COOLER_COOLING_METHOD WHERE COOLER_COOLING_METHOD_IDX = C.COOLER_COOLING_METHOD_IDX) AS COOLER_COOLING_METHOD_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_AIR_COOLING_TYPE FROM COOLER_AIR_COOLING_TYPE WHERE COOLER_AIR_COOLING_TYPE_IDX = C.COOLER_AIR_COOLING_TYPE_IDX) AS COOLER_AIR_COOLING_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_WEIGHT FROM COOLER_WEIGHT WHERE COOLER_WEIGHT_IDX = C.COOLER_WEIGHT_IDX) AS COOLER_WEIGHT_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_WIDTH FROM COOLER_WIDTH WHERE COOLER_WIDTH_IDX = C.COOLER_WIDTH_IDX) AS COOLER_WIDTH_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_LENGTH FROM COOLER_LENGTH WHERE COOLER_LENGTH_IDX = C.COOLER_LENGTH_IDX) AS COOLER_LENGTH_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_HEIGHT FROM COOLER_HEIGHT WHERE COOLER_HEIGHT_IDX = C.COOLER_HEIGHT_IDX) AS COOLER_HEIGHT_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_FAN_SIZE FROM COOLER_FAN_SIZE WHERE COOLER_FAN_SIZE_IDX = C.COOLER_FAN_SIZE_IDX) AS COOLER_FAN_SIZE_NAME, C.COOLER_RELEASE_DATE, (SELECT COOLER_FAN_CONNECTOR_NAME FROM COOLER_FAN_CONNECTOR WHERE COOLER_FAN_CONNECTOR_IDX = C.COOLER_FAN_CONNECTOR_IDX) AS COOLER_FAN_CONNECTOR_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_EXTRA_FEATURES FROM COOLER_EXTRA_FEATURES WHERE COOLER_EXTRA_FEATURES_IDX = C.COOLER_EXTRA_FEATURES_IDX) AS COOLER_EXTRA_FEATURES_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_MAX_NOISE_LEVEL FROM COOLER_MAX_NOISE_LEVEL WHERE COOLER_MAX_NOISE_LEVEL_IDX = C.COOLER_MAX_NOISE_LEVEL_IDX) AS COOLER_MAX_NOISE_LEVEL_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_RPM FROM COOLER_RPM WHERE COOLER_RPM_IDX = C.COOLER_RPM_IDX) AS COOLER_RPM_NAME, C.COOLER_WARRANTY_PERIOD, C.COOLER_ORIGIN_PRICE, C.COOLER_NOW_PRICE, (SELECT COOLER_INTEL_SOCKET FROM COOLER_INTEL_SOCKET WHERE COOLER_INTEL_SOCKET_IDX = C.COOLER_INTEL_SOCKET_IDX) AS COOLER_INTEL_SOCKET_NAME, (SELECT COOLER_AMD_SOCKET FROM COOLER_AMD_SOCKET WHERE COOLER_AMD_SOCKET_IDX = C.COOLER_AMD_SOCKET_IDX) AS COOLER_AMD_SOCKET_NAME, C.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX, (SELECT COOLER_SFILE_NAME FROM COOLER_IMAGE WHERE COOLER_IDX = C.COOLER_IDX) FROM COOLER AS C
